mapper.select: SELECT HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_DT , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_NT_AC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_NT_ITV , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_NT_AC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_NT_ITV , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_RS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_SG , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AP , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AT , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_CC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_RS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_SG , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AP , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AT , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_CC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_NT FROM TB_EST_HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS ORDER BY HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_DT DESC

SELECT HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_DT , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_NT_AC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_NT_ITV , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_NT_AC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_NT_ITV , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_RS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_SG , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AP , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AT , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_CC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_RS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_SG , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AP , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AT , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AS , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_CC , HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_NT FROM TB_EST_HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS ORDER BY HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_DT DESC

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_NT_AC),0) AS HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_NT_AC, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_NT_ITV),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsSriNtItv, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_NT_AC),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkNtAc, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_NT_ITV),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkNtItv, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_RS),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsSriSrcRs, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_SG),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsSriSrcSg, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AP),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsSriSrcAp, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AT),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsSriSrcAt, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_AS),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsSriSrcAs, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_SRI_SRC_CC),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsSriSrcCc, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_RS),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkSrcRs, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_SG),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkSrcSg, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AP),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkSrcAp, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AT),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkSrcAt, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_AS),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkSrcAs, IFNULL(SUM( HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_JK_SRC_CC),0) AS hmnRsrcsSttstcsJkSrcCc FROM TB_EST_HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS WHERE HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_DT >= #{startDt} AND HMN_RSRCS_STTSTCS_DT <= #{endDt}
